eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Missouri; AT 10:19 AM ON DEC 02, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:19 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THE FOLLOWING IS A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM, ORIGINATING FROM THE MISSOURI STATE HIGHWAY PATROL IN JEFFERSON CITY AND COORDINATED WITH THE LOCAL BROADCASTERS IN YOUR COMMUNITY. THIS IS ONLY A TEST.
